segments.text: Mike , did you win the lottery or something ? Why the big smile ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so relieved . I just passed the bar exam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You did ? That's great ! You must be very happy now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's an understatement . I'm on cloud nine . I couldn't be any happier .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you tell your parents yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not yet . I didn't get a hold of them . I'll try to call them again tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're probably going to be so happy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . It's turning out to be a great day .
segments.speaker: S2
